w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Navigations
Navs
w:HTMLPanel.p: A Nav is a component used to display navigation data.
w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Nav Tabs
w:HTMLPanel.p: Nav can be displayed as Tabs with th use of Nav.Style.TABS.
w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Nav Pills
w:HTMLPanel.p: Nav can be displayed as Pills with th use of Nav.Style.PILLS.
Pills can also be stacked with th use of Nav.Style.PILLS_STACKED.
w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Justified nav
w:HTMLPanel.p: Tabs or Pills can be justified by the use of Nav.Style.TABS_JUSTIFIED or Nav.Style.PILLS_JUSTIFIED.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Nav style="PILLS_JUSTIFIED"> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Profile"/> <w:NavLink label="Message"/> </w:Nav> <w:Nav style="TABS_JUSTIFIED"> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Profile"/> <w:NavLink label="Message"/> </w:Nav>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Dropdown use
w:HTMLPanel.p: Navs can contains NavDropdown to extends the nav display with dropdowns.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Nav style="TABS"> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Profile"/> <w:NavDropdown label="Message"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="subMessage"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Create"/> <w:NavLink label="Delete"/> </w:NavDropdown> </w:Nav> <w:Nav style="PILLS"> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Profile"/> <w:NavDropdown label="Message"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="subMessage"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Create"/> <w:NavLink label="Delete"/> </w:NavDropdown> </w:Nav> <w:Nav style="PILLS_STACKED"> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Profile"/> <w:NavDropdown label="Message"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="subMessage"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Create"/> <w:NavLink label="Delete"/> </w:NavDropdown> </w:Nav> <w:Nav style="PILLS_JUSTIFIED"> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Profile"/> <w:NavDropdown label="Message"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="subMessage"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Create"/> <w:NavLink label="Delete"/> </w:NavDropdown> </w:Nav> <w:Nav style="TABS_JUSTIFIED"> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Profile"/> <w:NavDropdown label="Message"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="subMessage"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Create"/> <w:NavLink label="Delete"/> </w:NavDropdown> </w:Nav>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Icon customization
w:HTMLPanel.p: NavLink and NavDropdown can be customize with iconType property like ButtonDropdown.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Nav style="TABS"> <w:NavLink iconType="HOME" active="true" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Profile"/> <w:NavDropdown iconType="USERS" label="Message"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="subMessage"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink iconType="ADD" label="Create"/> <w:NavLink label="Delete"/> </w:NavDropdown> </w:Nav> <w:Nav style="PILLS"> <w:NavLink iconType="HOME" active="true" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Profile"/> <w:NavDropdown iconType="USERS" label="Message"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="subMessage"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink iconType="ADD" label="Create"/> <w:NavLink label="Delete"/> </w:NavDropdown> </w:Nav> <w:Nav style="PILLS_STACKED"> <w:NavLink iconType="HOME" active="true" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Profile"/> <w:NavDropdown iconType="USERS" label="Message"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="subMessage"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink iconType="ADD" label="Create"/> <w:NavLink label="Delete"/> </w:NavDropdown> </w:Nav> <w:Nav style="PILLS_JUSTIFIED"> <w:NavLink iconType="HOME" active="true" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Profile"/> <w:NavDropdown iconType="USERS" label="Message"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="subMessage"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink iconType="ADD" label="Create"/> <w:NavLink label="Delete"/> </w:NavDropdown> </w:Nav> <w:Nav style="TABS_JUSTIFIED"> <w:NavLink iconType="HOME" active="true" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Profile"/> <w:NavDropdown iconType="USERS" label="Message"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="subMessage"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink iconType="ADD" label="Create"/> <w:NavLink label="Delete"/> </w:NavDropdown> </w:Nav>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Navbar
w:HTMLPanel.p: A convenient navigation component which collapse when screen is to small
Set the brand property and add Nav child with NavLink children.
w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Type
w:HTMLPanel.p: Use Navbar.Type.INVERSE to inverse the navbar type

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Navbar type="INVERSE"> <w:Brand> <w:Anchor text="PWT"/> </w:Brand> <w:Nav> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Profile"/> <w:NavLink label="Message"/> </w:Nav> </w:Navbar>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: ContainerType
w:HTMLPanel.p: Use RESPONSIVE or FLUID (default to FLUID) to set the navbar inner container type. This allows you to have a NavBar with responsive fixed inner width (as in this application navbar) or with a full width inner content.
w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Dropdown use
w:HTMLPanel.p: Add NavDropdown children to extends the navbar display with dropdowns.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Navbar> <w:Brand> <w:Anchor text="PWT"/> </w:Brand> <w:Nav> <w:NavLink label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Profile"/> <w:NavLink label="Message"/> <w:NavDropdown label="Third Part" active="true"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Account" active="true"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Settings"/> <w:NavLink label="Display"/> </w:NavDropdown> </w:Nav> </w:Navbar>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Icon customization
w:HTMLPanel.p: NavLink and NavDropdown can be customize with iconType property like ButtonDropdown.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Navbar> <w:Brand> <w:Anchor text="PWT"/> </w:Brand> <w:Nav> <w:NavLink iconType="HOME" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Profile"/> <w:NavLink label="Message"/> <w:NavDropdown iconType="USER" label="Third Part" active="true"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Account" active="true"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink iconType="COG" label="Settings"/> <w:NavLink label="Display"/> </w:NavDropdown> </w:Nav> </w:Navbar>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Button use
w:HTMLPanel.p: Add Button or ButtonGroup children.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Navbar> <w:Brand> <w:Anchor text="PWT"/> </w:Brand> <w:Nav> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Home"/> </w:Nav> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" text="Default" /> <w:ButtonGroup> <w:Button text="Left" iconType="SAVE" type="PRIMARY"/> <w:Button text="middle" type="DANGER" active="true"/> <w:Button text="right" iconType="VIEW" disabled="true"/> </w:ButtonGroup> </w:Navbar>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Alignment
w:HTMLPanel.p: Use left and right children to pull left or right Navbar content.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Navbar> <w:Brand> <w:Anchor text="PWT"/> </w:Brand> <w:Nav> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Home"/> </w:Nav> <w:right> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" text="Default" /> </w:right> </w:Navbar> <w:Navbar> <w:Brand> <w:Anchor text="PWT"/> </w:Brand> <w:right> <w:Nav> <w:NavLink label="Blog"/> <w:NavLink label="Demo"/> </w:Nav> </w:right> <w:left> <w:Nav> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Profile"/> <w:NavLink label="Message"/> </w:Nav> </w:left> </w:Navbar>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Breadcrumb
w:HTMLPanel.p: Indicate the current page's location. As in Bootstrap, separators are automatically add in CSS.
Set the active property to disable the link.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Breadcrumb> <w:NavLink label="Home" active="true"/> </w:Breadcrumb> <w:Breadcrumb> <w:NavLink label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Library" active="true" /> </w:Breadcrumb> <w:Breadcrumb> <w:NavLink label="Home"/> <w:NavLink label="Library"/> <w:NavLink label="Data" active="true" /> </w:Breadcrumb>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Icon customization
w:HTMLPanel.p: Use the iconType property to customize the NavLink.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Breadcrumb> <w:NavLink iconType="HOME" label="Home" active="true"/> </w:Breadcrumb> <w:Breadcrumb> <w:NavLink iconType="HOME" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink iconType="BOOK" label="Library" active="true" /> </w:Breadcrumb> <w:Breadcrumb> <w:NavLink iconType="HOME" label="Home"/> <w:NavLink iconType="BOOK"label="Library"/> <w:NavLink iconType="PENCIL"label="Data" active="true" /> </w:Breadcrumb>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Pagination
w:HTMLPanel.p: Use the style property to define the type of pagination.

w:Alert.p: The size property works properly only with the PAGINATION style.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Pagination style="PAGER" nbPage="10" currentPage="4"/> <w:Pagination style="PAGER" nbPage="10" nbPageMax="3" currentPage="4"/> <w:Pagination style="PAGINATION" size="LARGE" nbPage="10" currentPage="4"/> <w:Pagination style="PAGINATION" size="SMALL" nbPage="10" nbPageMax="3" currentPage="4"/>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: NavSpy
w:HTMLPanel.p: A NavSpy contains a link to registered Heading widgets, and listen to the scroll of the body or of a particular widget to display the curent active heading.
The Heading you want to display in the NavSpy have to be manualy registered with the navSpy property. After all registering you need to call the redraw method on the NavSpy in order to display it.
Use the scrollWidget property to set the targeting scroll widget. If no one is set, the the body element will be used.
Eventually you may want to apply an offset to the top of the scroll widget to spy the scroll or to navigate to the selected Heading. Use the spyOffset property.
We use this spy offset in this sample to take into account the navbar height when scrolling and spying scroll on the body
